description:
Molecano is an all-new word puzzle game from the creator of Dadish! Help Molene the mole explore volcanoes using words as a bridge. String words together so Molene can cross safely and collect all the delicious food strewn across the lava loaded levels.

• A unique and challenging word puzzle game
• 500 levels, with more to come
• From the creator of Dadish and Super Fowlst
• Cool characters to unlock
• Playing this game will make you smart, probably
• A good game for people who know some words
• A chill soundtrack
• Relax and unwind... in a volcano!
name: Molecano
